div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 106229004 (Qualifier for type of diagnosis)

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
